about_the_game:
In the realm of GrundHeim, crafted with unwavering dedication by a solo developer, a tapestry of ancient powers and shifting destinies await your discovery. This indie RPG invites you to navigate a world on the precipice of chaos, where the echoes of past choices resound in every shadow. Embark on an odyssey through a narrative as sprawling and diverse as the lands themselves.

The heart of the game lies in its combat: engage in real-time battles, where every decision carries weight.Venture forth into dynamic environments that breathe with a life of their own. Every location conceals its own secrets, challenges, and hidden treasures. As you journey, a sense of immersion envelops you, drawing you deeper into a world teeming with history and mystery. GrundHeim is more than a game. It is a labor of love, meticulously crafted by a solo developer. Every pixel, every line of code, bears the mark of dedication and respect for the RPG genre. It is a testament to the power of one person's vision, brought to life with heart, soul, and a deep reverence for the craft.

Embark on a quest of cosmic magnitude. Let your choices echo through the annals of time, and may your reckoning be written in the stars. Will you rise to the challenge?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Athlon X4 880K or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 580 or equivalent
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
